text: The system must provide human-AI tutoring to improve student learning outcomes.
The system must integrate with existing educational platforms such as i-Ready.
The system must ensure personalized instructional approaches for students.
The system must be cost-effective and scalable for widespread adoption.
The system must ensure data privacy and security for student information.
The system will be used in a socioeconomically diverse student population.
The system must be compatible with existing educational infrastructure and technology.
The AI tutor system must provide personalized assistance to students.
The AI tutor system must adapt to individual learning styles.
The AI tutor system must provide immediate feedback to students.
The AI tutor system must ensure effective implementation and integration into educational systems.
The AI tutor system must address concerns about privacy and data security.
The AI tutor system must minimize potential biases in AI algorithms.
The AI tutor system will be used in programming education.
Students will have prior knowledge and experience with AI technologies.
The system must provide instant feedback to students on their pronunciation skills
The system must be able to recognize and correct English pronunciation errors
The system must support both British and American English accents
The system must be user-friendly and easy to use for students and teachers
The system must be integrated with existing Learning Management Systems (LMS)
Students and teachers will have access to the necessary technology and internet connectivity to use the system
